des: "This used to be one of my favorite hot cereals when I was a child. It has a pleasing sweet flavor without added sugar and a sunny yellow color. I adapted this Russian recipe for a slow cooker."
ins:
Place pumpkin, water, rice milk, and millet in a slow cooker and stir well.
Cook on Low until creamy, 4 to 5 hours. Stir butter and salt into cereal before serving.
